title: Here & Now exercises
introText: Here & Now skills help you ground your attention in the present moment. Use these exercises to quiet mental chatter and develop mindful awareness through your body, senses, and thoughts.

exercises.title: Mindful Presence Practice
exercises.description: A complete mindfulness journey through body awareness, object observation, thought visualization, and reflection

exercises.title: Finding Presence
exercises.description: Present-moment awareness is a skill that develops with practice. Each time you notice your mind wandering and gently bring it back, you're strengthening your mindfulness muscle.
